imdb.plot outline: Overwatch, Lol, CS:GO, those names might not be familiar to you. But for milions of fans, regularly gathered in huge stadiums it is a new religion, it is Esport. This worldwide phenomenon is turning into a structured industry. L'esport fait vivre, is a webserie dedicated to the industry actors of this new dawn. What is a pro gamer routine ? Who are the fans and why are they ? What role for women ? - Following a competition we will focus on ten topic in relation with what may be the most unifying sport of the 21st century.
imdb.title: L'esport Fait Vivre
